title: 一个想法
content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以 PC/MacOS/Linux 桌面系统为运行环境，开发一款类似 Filmly、VidHub、InFuse 的应用，首先覆盖以上应用的能力，支持本地影片（本机、samba、webdev、云盘）的信息刮削，其次支持流媒体平台（腾讯视频、优酷视频、爱奇艺、bilibili、芒果等）的信息规范化显示（类似目前 Filmly、VidHub 应用的显示形式）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主打支持 TV 遥控器操作（上、下、左、右、确认、返回以及启动），通过遥控器一键启动应用有线连接（HDMI、DP）或无线投屏到大屏设备，通过遥控器操作应用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主打卖点："}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"无须再购买大屏视频会员，直接使用 PC 端的会员即可观看会员影片"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"影片信息的规范化显示"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主要技术："}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主界面使用 Web Vue 框架构建"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后端使用 nodejs 通过 puppeteer 实时抓取视频网站的品类数据"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 puppeteer 操作浏览器精简播放页面，可添加统一的 UI 以启用更多功能（播放、暂停、进度条、声音、清晰度、选集）"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"align":"left"}}]}
